name: Mister Rogers' Neighborhood: Many Ways To Say I Love You
overview: Happy times. Sad times. Thank you times. I am sorry times. These are just some of the times when people find ways to say "I Love You." Now, with the aid of this creative design activity, Mister Rogers provides children and adults with new opportunities to express themselves to the people they care about. MANY WAYS TO SAY I LOVE YOU presents a playful setting in which children and their families create their own electronic greeting cards. It includes a selection of backgrounds and borders, dozens of "stickers" to choose from, including characters from the Neighborhood of Make-Believe, and colorful electronic crayons for creating original designs. You can personalize your card with word messages and add Mister Rogers' Neighborhood songs and other favorite childhood tunes. When you're finished, along comes the Neighborhood Trolley to prepare your card for an animated on-screen delivery!
